# About

Prioritise cell-type-specific gene targets from
the [Rare Disease Celltyping](https://neurogenomics.github.io/rare_disease_celltyping_apps/home/)
project.

Thesis project by Momoko Otani, supervised by Nathan Skene and Brian Schilder.
